Card.cardDescription:
Title: Heaven's General
Health/Gender: 3M
Ability:
Lightning Strike: Whenever you play or use a DODGE, you may choose another target hero to perform a judgment: 1. If the result is a SPADES suit, you deal 2 LIGHTNING damage to that hero. 2. If the result is a CLUBS suit, you deal 1 LIGHTNING damage to that hero and gain 1 health.
Dark Magic: Whenever a hero performs a judgement, you may take the judgement card and replace it with a BLACK card from your hand or equipment zone. The judgement is resolved with the new card.
Amber Sky: (Emperor Ability) Once during the main phase of a KINGDOMLESS faction hero's turn, the KINGDOMLESS faction hero may give you a DODGE or LIGHTNING BOLT card.

Title: Noble Warlord
Health/Gender: 4M
Ability:
Random Strike: During your main phase, you may discard 2 cards of the same suit from your hand and treat it as you playing HAIL OF ARROWS.
Bloodline: Your maximum hand size is increase by X, where X is 2 times the number of other surviving KINGDOMLESS faction heroes.

Title: Archenemy
Health/Gender: 8M
Ability:
Drown in Wine: You may use a SPADES suited card from your hand as WINE.
Garden of Lust: When a FEMALE hero plays an ATTACK on you, it can only be cancelled by 2 DODGE and vice versa.
Collapse: At the end of your turn, if you are not the hero with lowest health, you must either lose 1 life or lose 1 unit of max health.
Tyrant: (Emperor Ability) Whenever another KINGDOMLESS faction hero deals damage, you may have that hero perform a judgement; if the result is BLACK, you gain 1 health.

Title: Miracle Physician
Health/Gender: 3M
Ability:
Medicine Bag: Once during your main phase, you may choose any number of target heroes that do not share the same faction together, then you discard a card from your hand or equipment zone; then each targeted hero must discard a card. If any targeted heroes discarded a SPADES suited card, that hero draws a card. (Unless you target yourself with this ability and discard a SPADES suited card ontop of your initial discarded card, you do not draw a card.)
First Aid: Outside of your turn, you may play RED cards from your hand and equipment zone as a PEACH.

Title: Embodiment of Force
Health/Gender: 5M
Ability:
Matchless: Whenever you are the source of an ATTACK, the defending hero needs to play 2 DODGE cards in order to cancel the ATTACK. Whenever you are involved in a duel, the other hero needs to discard 2 ATTACK cards in order to respond to your discarded ATTACK.
Mercenary Contract: Whenever you deal damage to a target hero with an ATTACK, the targeted hero may give you a card and choose another target hero. This is treated as you playing a DUEL to the other targeted hero. (The targeted hero cannot choose themself as the target for the DUEL and must choose another target hero.)

Title: Unrivalled Dancing Princess
Health/Gender: 3M
Ability:
Wedge Driving: Once during your main phase, you may discard a card and choose 2 target MALE heroes. If you do, this is treated as one of them playing a DUEL on the other. (You pick which hero initiates the DUEL.)
Eclipse: At the end of your turn, you may draw a card.

Title: Masterpiece of Dance and Beauty
Health/Gender: 3M
Ability:
Soul Surrender: Once during your main phase, you may discard a card and flip your hero over; then take all the cards from the hand of a target MALE hero. At the end of you main phase, you must give X cards to the targeted MALE hero. (X is current health of the targeted MALE hero. You may choose to give cards from your hand or equipment zone. If you have fewer cards than the MALE hero's current health, you must gives him all of your cards.)
Eclipse: At the end of your turn, you may draw a card.

Title: Devil General
Health/Gender: 6M
Ability:
Military Glory: Whenever you are dealt damage by a RED ATTACK or a ATTACK with WINE, you lose 1 units of max health.

Title: Dominating Commands
Health/Gender: 6M
Ability:
Swagger: Whenever a hero deals damage to you with a RED ATTACK, that hero may gain 1 health or draw a card.

Title: Ever Increasing Ambition
Health/Gender: 4M
Ability:
Arrogant: At the beginning of the EMPEROR's turn, you may draw 1 card. If you do, the EMPEROR's hand limit is reduced by 1 until the end of turn.
All in same boat: Whenever another hero plays an ATTACK and you are within that hero's attack range, if the number of cards in your hand is greater than your current health, that hero can only choose you as the target of any ATTACK.

Title: The Emperor of Zhong Dynasty
Health/Gender: 4M
Ability:
Mediocrity: During your draw phase, you draw X additional cards. At the beginning of your discard phase, you discard X cards. (X is the number of surviving factions in play.)
Pseudo-Emperor: You gain the Emperor ability of the current EMPEROR.

Title: Priest of Tai Ping
Health/Gender: 3M
Ability:
Bewilder: Whenever you want to use a basic or non-delay tactics card, you may play a card face down and announce a basic or non-delay tactics card name you want the face down card to be to played as. Then each hero in sequence states whether the face down card is the same as the announced card named or not. If no hero doubts the face down card, the effects of the announced card proceeds to being resolved. If any heroes doubt the face down card, it is immediately revealed after having asked all heroes in sequence.
If the name of the revealed card is the same as what you have announced, all heroes who have doubted loses 1 health; if the revealed card has a HEARTS suit, resolve the card as the announced name. If the name of the revealed card is not the same as what you have announced, all heroes who have doubted draws a card; the announced card's effect is canceled and the card is discarded. (Heroes on the brink of death state cannot doubt you. If the card's effect was canceled through being revealed as false, it is counted as you never having played the announced card at all. For example, if the announced ATTACK was false, you are still allowed to play another ATTACK.)

Title: Rider and Ride As One
Health/Gender: 4M
Ability:
Horsemanship: The physical range you see other heroes is reduced by 1.
Fierce Attack: Whenever you play an ATTACK targeting a hero, you may discard a card from that hero's hand or equipment zone. If the discarded card was an equipment, this ATTACK cannot be cancelled by a DODGE. If the discarded card was not an equipment, that hero take this ATTACK card into their hand.

Title: The Vanguard on a White Horse
Health/Gender: 3M
Ability:
Dragon Courage: You may play or discard ATTACK cards as DODGE or vice versa.
Pierce the Formation: Whenever you activate [DRAGON COURAGE], you may immediately take a card from the hand of the targeted hero.

Title: Eternally A Hero
Health/Gender: 4M
Ability:
Pursuit: The physical range you see heroes with health less than you is 1.
Sworn Revenge: Your ATTACKs may target up to +X additional heroes. (X is your missing health.)

Title: Tiger and Wolf brothers
Health/Gender: 4M
Ability:
Dual Heroes: At the beginning of your draw phase, you may choose to skip your draw and perform a judgment; reveal the judgment card and take it into your hand. Until the end of your turn, you may play cards in your hand with opposite color to the revealed card as a DUEL.

Title: Cold-Blooded Advisor
Health/Gender: 3M
Ability:
Perfect Murder: During your turn, if a hero is on the brink of death; only you and that hero may use PEACH cards.
Upheaval: (Limited Ability) During your main phase, each hero other than you must choose to play an ATTACK targeting another hero closest in attack range to them or lose 1 health.
Shroud: You cannot be the target of BLACK tactics cards. (This includes cards that target all heroes and non-delay tactics cards.)

Title: The Mysterious Transcendent
Health/Gender: 3M
Ability:
Incarnation: At the beginning of the game, you randomly take 2 unused hero cards as [INCARNATION], reveal them and declare one to be active. You only gain 1 ability from the active [INCARNATION]. Your gender and faction become the gender and faction of the [INCARNATION]. (Emperor, Awakening, and Limited Abilities are excluded.)
At the beginning and end of your turn, you may replace your active [INCARNATION] with another one and gain 1 ability from the new active [INCARNATION].
Rebirth: Whenever you are dealt damage, for each damage, gain 1 random [INCARNATION] from the unused hero cards.

Title: Lonely Dame in Foreign Lands
Health/Gender: 3F
Ability:
Song of Lament: Whenever a hero is dealt damage by an ATTACK, you may discard a card from your hand or equipment zone and perform a judgment.
If the result is: HEARTS: The defender gains 1 life. DIAMONDS: The defender draws 2 cards. CLUBS: The source of damage discards 2 cards. SPADES: The source of damage flip their hero card.
Sorrow: The hero who killed you loses all abilities for the rest of the game.

Title: Ever-Victorious Warrior
Health/Gender: 4M
Ability:
Fearless Charge: Once during your main phase, you may clash with a target hero; if you win, until end of your turn, you ignore the effects of any armor equipment on that hero, ignore any attack/physical range requirements for cards you play targeting that hero, and you may play any number of ATTACK cards targeting that hero. If you did not win, you cannot play ATTACK cards until the end of your turn.
Prohibition: Your WINE cards are always treated as ATTACKs.

Title: Upright and Heroic
Health/Gender: 3M
Ability:
Brilliant Scheme: Once during yout main phase, you may give 1 equipment card or ATTACK card to a target hero, that hero then chooses one of the following: 1. The targeted hero choooses a hero within their attack range and is considered to have used an ATTACK. 2. The targeted hero draws a card.
Late Response: Whenever you are dealt damage outside of your turn, you ignore all effects from ATTACK and non-delay tactics card until the end of this turn.

Title: Ruler of Jiang Nan
Health/Gender: 4M
Ability:
Self-Preservation: During your draw phase, you may draw X additional cards. If you do, cards you play this turn cannot target other heroes. (X is the number of factions in play. You cannot use cards that target all other heroes, but if you use cards that target all heroes, you will be the only hero targeted instead.)
House of Royalty: Your hand size is increased by X. (X is the number of surviving factions in play.)

Title: Lofty Man of Jiang Chu
Health/Gender: 3M
Ability:
Screw Work: Whenever you gain cards in your hand outside of your turn, you must discards those cards. During your turn, whenever you discard a card that shares the same rank as a card in the discard pile, you may take the card that shares the same rank into your hand. (You should never be able to gain cards outside of your turn. Delay tactics and equipment cards that are moved into your field are not required to be discarded.)
Inebriated: (Limited ability) Once per game, at the beginning of your turn, you reveal 3 cards from top of the deck and attach them onto your hero. You cannot play or be affected by the same type of cards attached onto your hero. At the beginning of each of your turns, you reveal another 3 cards attach them onto your hero. This process continues until you have 2 cards of the same rank. Whenever you have 2 cards of the same rank attached onto your hero, take all the attached cards into your hand. (Cards that you gain from this ability is not affected by [SCREW WORK].)

Title: Feathered and Belled Warrior
Health/Gender: 4M
Ability:
Silver Bells: During your main phase, you may discard a BLACK card; then take a card from another target hero and attach it onto your hero face up as a [BROCADE]. You may have a max of 4 [BROCADES] attached.
Military Prestige: At the end of your turn, you may discard 3 [BROCADES] and choose a target hero, the targeted hero chooses one: 1. The targeted hero gives you a DODGE, then you give the DODGE to another target hero. 2. The targeted hero loses 1 health; then you may choose one of their equipment in their equipment zone and attach it face down onto their hero. The attached card is put back into their equipment zone at the end of their next turn. (The faced down card cannot be affected by other card affects while attached to the target hero.)

Title: Stand Aloof From Affairs
Health/Gender: 3F
Ability:
Anxious Fear: At the beginning of each other hero's turn, if you are damaged, you may clash with the current turn hero. If you win, that hero may only play cards that target themself until the end of turn. If you lose, the physical range between the both of you is considered 1 until end of turn.
Plead for Help: Whenever you become the target of an ATTACK, you may choose a target hero other than the attacker. The targeted hero may give you a DODGE card. If the targeted hero does not, they become the additional target of the ATTACK.

Title: Demonic Advisor
Health/Gender: 3M
Ability:
Annihilate: At the end of your turn, you may deal 1 damage to a target hero (other than you) with no cards in hand.
Exterminate: Once during your main phase, you may put one BLACK tactics card on top of the library and target a hero with cards in their hand, that hero must either discards a tactics card, or discard 2 cards from his hand or equipment zone.
Burn the City: (Limited ability) During your main phase, you may target each other hero. Each targeted hero in sequence must choose one of the following: 1. Discard 1+X cards from hand or equipment zone. (X is the number of cards the previous player has discarded.) 2. You deal 2 FIRE damage to the targeted hero.

Title: Military Schemer
Health/Gender: 3M
Ability:
Progressive Strategy: Whenever you play a card during your main phase, if the card you play has the same rank or suit as the previous card you have played this turn, you may draw a card.
Aiming the North: Whenever you are dealt damage, if it was the first time you are dealt damage this turn, you gain 1 health; if it was not the first time you are dealt damage this turn, you lose 1 health. (This effect activates before you enter the brink of death state.)

Title: Queen of Jin Zhou
Health/Gender: 3F
Ability:
Eavesdrop: At the end of each other hero's turn, if they have not played a card that targeted a hero other than themself this turn, you may choose one of the following: 1. You take a card in that hero's equipment zone into your equipment zone. (You cannot replace a equipment from an occupied slot) 2. You draw a card. (This can be activated even if that hero only played cards that target all heroes.)
Cession: (Limited Ability) During your main phase, you may give all cards in your equipment zone to another target hero, that hero chooses one of the following: 1. You gain X health. 2. You deal 1 damage to X target heroes within that hero's attack range. (X is the number of cards you chose to give to that hero.)

Title: The Shady Warlord
Health/Gender: 4M
Ability:
Disloyalty: Once during your main phase, you may reveal all cards in your hand. If all your cards are not the same color, you discard all cards of one color, then choose X target heroes and take a card from each of their hand or equipment zone into your hand. (X is the number of cards you discarded.)
If you put 2 or more cards into your hand, you lose 1 health.

Title: The Ferocious Dual
Health/Gender: 3M
Ability:
Reckless Assault: At the beginning of your main phase, you may draw 2 cards. If you do, your hand size becomes X this turn. (X is the amount of damage you deal this turn.)
Cover Up: Whenever you need to play a DODGE, you may choose to let the current turn hero draw a card, if that hero is not among heroes with the highest amount of cards in hand, you discard a card from a target hero's hand. The targeted hero must be among the heroes with the highest amount of cards in their hand.
(If there is a draw among heroes with the highest amount of cards in hand, you may choose one of them to discard from.)

Title: The Benevolent Ruler
Health/Gender: 2M
Ability:
Peacekeeping: Once per each hero's main phase, if the number of cards in your hand is greater than your current health, you may target a hero with you in their attack range; unless that hero plays an ATTACK targeting you, that hero gives you an equipment card from their equipment zone to your hand.
Ancestral Blessing: At the beginning of the game, you increase your max health by X. If all heroes of a faction are removed from the game, you reduce your max health by 1. (X is the number of surviving factions in the game.)

Title: The Powerful Eunuch
Health/Gender: 3M
Ability:
Creating Chaos: You may announce a basic card or non-delay tactics card name, then play a card from your hand as the named card. You cannot announce a card name you have already used for [CREATING CHAOS] for the rest of the game. After the card's effect is resolved, you target another hero and that hero chooses one of the following: 1. The targeted hero gives you a card from their hand or equipment zone which is not the same type as the announced card. 2. You lose 1 health and cannot use [CREATING CHAOS] for the rest of the turn.

Title: White Horse General
Health/Gender: 4M
Ability:
Fierce Mount: Whenever you deal damage to a target hero with a BLACK ATTACK, you may discard a card from their equipment zone; if the discarded card is a mount, you take it into your hand.
Follower of Virtue: Whenever you have 3 or more health, the physical range you see other heroes is reduced by 1. Whenever you have 2 or less health, the physical range other heroes see you is increased by 1.

Title: Spreading Aid Throughout the Nation
Health/Gender: 3M
Ability:
Free Accomondation: At the end of your turn, if you do not have any [RICE] cards attached to you, you may draw 2 cards and attach 2 cards from your hand or equipment zone onto your character face-up as [RICE] cards. When the last [RICE] card is removed from you, you gain 1 health.
Donate: When you deal or are dealt damage, the hero who was dealt damage may put a [RICE] card into their hand per damage received.
Rice Religion: When a player performs a judgment, you may replace the revealed judgement card with a [RICE] card. The new card becomes the judgment result.

Title: The Great Graceful Scholar
Health/Gender: 3M
Ability:
Discourse in Praise: Whenever you play or become the target of another hero's SPADES suited card, you may take a card from the top of the library and attach it to your hero as a [BOOK]. (max. 4) Each [BOOK] card increases your hand size limit by 1.
Extensive Communication: At the end of your draw phase, you may swap any number of [BOOK] cards with the cards you own. If your [BOOKS] cards are one each suit, give all your [BOOK] cards to another target hero.

Title: Empress Xianmu of Han
Health/Gender: 3F
Ability:
Protect the Seal: Whenever you become the target of an ATTACK, you may announce the name of a card. Unless the attacker discards the card you announced and takes 1 card from your hand or equipment zone, the ATTACK is cancelled. (You may only announce each card name once per game.)
Benifiting Civilians: At the end of your turn, you may draw X cards. (X is the number of players who has less cards in hand than their current health.) Then you reveal X cards from your hand and select a target hero. Starting from that hero, each other hero in sequence takes 1 of the revealed cards.

Title: Love's Dying Dream
Health/Gender: 3F
Ability:
Deplete Karma: Whenever you deal damage to another hero, if their health is greater than your health, you may discard a BLACK card to increase the damage by +1. Whenever you are dealt damage by another hero, if their health is greater than your health, you may discard a RED card to reduce the damage by -1. (This effect takes priority before calculating armor effects.)
Burning Heart: Whenever another hero dies and reveals their role: If their role was LOYALIST, you ignore the health requirement when using [DEPLETE KARMA] to reduce damage. If their role was REBEL, you ignore the health requirement when using [DEPLETE KARMA] to increase damage. If their role was SPY, you ignore the color requirement when using [DEPLETE KARMA] to reduce damage.

Title: Imprisoned Emperor
Health/Gender: 3M
Ability:
Mandate of Heaven: Whenever you become the target of an ATTACK, you may discard 2 cards; then draw 2 cards. A hero, other than you, with the highest amount of health may also perform this skill. (If you have less than 2 cards, you may discard your hand to activate this skill.)
Secret Edict: Once per a hero's main phase, you may give all the cards in your hand to a target player; then choose another target hero, the targeted heroes must perform a clash. The winner of the clash is considered to have played an ATTACK on the loser. (If the seconds targeted hero is unable to perform a clash, the first targeted hero still receives the cards you give. If the clash ends in a draw, nothing happens.)

Title: General of the Land
Health/Gender: 3M
Ability:
Curse: Once per a hero's main phase, you may attach a card from your hand as a [CURSE] onto another target hero with no [CURSE] card attached. When a hero with a [CURSE] card attach performs a judgement, the [CURSE] card is used as the judgement result. At the end of a hero's turn, any hero who used a [CURSE] as their judgement result loses 1 health. (No card is flipped from the library when performing a judgement for the hero with a [CURSE] attached, the [CURSE] card is immediately used as the judgement result. When you die, the attached [CURSE] card effects remain in play.
Shadow Soldier: When a hero with a [CURSE] card attached plays a card with the same suit as the [CURSE], you draw a card. If you draw 2 cards due to the effect of the same [CURSE] card, the [CURSE] card is remove from that hero.

Title: Deep Resolve for the Country
Health/Gender: 4M
Ability:
Plan for Defeat: Whenever you play an ATTACK on a target hero, you may choose one: 1. Draw a card. 2. Discard 1 card from the targeted hero's hand. If the targeted hero plays a DODGE, the targeted hero discards a card from you.

Title: Vicious and Manipulate Power for Personal Gain
Health/Gender: 3F
Ability:
Poison Wine: At the beginning of another hero's main phase, you may discard a card from your hand. This is considered as the active hero playing a WINE; then you deal 1 damage to that hero.
Confusing Sorrow: At the end of each hero's turn, you may draw 3 cards for each hero you have killed this turn.

Title: Thunder Festival's Pretty Women
Health/Gender: 3F
Ability:
Mark of the Sea: Whenever you play an ATTACK, you may treat it as a LIGHTNING ATTACK.
Sacrifice Offering: Whenever a hero is being dealt LIGHTNING damage, you may have that hero perform a judgement. If the result is BLACK, the LIGHTNING damage is increased by +1; if the result is RED, the targeted hero takes the judgement card.

Title: Coalition Admiral
Health/Gender: 4M
Ability:
Mad Axe: Whenever your ATTACK deals damage to a target hero, you may choose one: 1. Move an equipment card from their equipment zone to your equipment zone. 2. Discard a card from the targeted hero's equipment zone. (You cannot move an equipment into an occupied equipment zone.)

Title: Love's Dying Dream
Health/Gender: 3M
Ability:
Seek Refudge from War: At the beginning of your draw phase, if you are at 1 physical range with another hero, you may skip your draw phase. If you do, your physical range with other heroes is increased by +X. (X is the number of factions in play.)
Under Ritual: At the end of another hero's turn, if you are not within the attack range of that hero, you may choose one: 1. You draw a card. 2. The target hero draws a card. Then decrease your physical range with other heroes by -1.

Title: Love's Dying Dream
Health/Gender: 15M
Ability:
Burning in War: Whenever you are dealt FIRE damage, you gain a [BURN]. At the end of your turn, you lose X health. (X is the number of [BURNS] you have.)
Fierce and Valiant: Whenever you play HAIL OF ARROWS or RRIAN ASSAULT, if you current health is less than the number of the current round; you may increase the damage by +1.

Title: Diamond in the Rough
Health/Gender: 3F
Ability:
Ingenious: At the beginning of your main phase, you may discard any number of equipment cards; then reveal X cards from the deck. Take any revealed tactics cards. (X is double the amount of equipment cards you have discarded.)
Exquisite: If you do not have any armor equipped, you are considered to have EIGHT TRIGRAMS equipped. If you do not have any mounts equipped, your hand size limit is increased by +1. If you do not have any treasure equipped, you have [WONDROUS TALENT].
[Wondrous Talent]: All tactics card you play may ignore any range requirements. Your equipped armor cannot be removed unless the targeted hero is within physical range of you. (Remove meaning that your armor card will no longer be in your equipment zone.)

Title: Swimming Dragon of Changshan
Health/Gender: 3M
Ability:
Deep Love to Motherland: You may play DIAMOND suited cards as ATTACKs or DODGEs. During your main phase, ATTACKs you play may target all heroes within your attack range.
Benevolence: (Limited Ability) Once per game, you may loose the [FOLLOWER OF VIRTUE] ability, increase your max health by +1, gain 1 health, and choose a target hero to draw 3 cards.
Follower of Virtue: Whenever you have 3 or more health, the physical range you see other heroes is reduced by 1. Whenever you have 2 or less health, the physical range other heroes see you is increased by 1.

Title: The Ferocious Lion of the West
Health/Gender: 3M
Ability:
Pursuit: The physical range you see heroes with health less than you is 1.
Acacia: At the beginning of your main phase, you may reveal the cards in your hand; if you do not have any ATTACK cards in your hand, you may play ATTACKs without playing the card until the number of cards in your hand changes. (To play an ATTACK with this ability, you must choose a target hero and annouce the ATTACK. You do not play a card, but the targeted hero may still respond to your ATTACK. This ATTACK counts towards the ATTACK restriction limit. ATTACK restriction limit: A hero is limted to playing 1 ATTACK per main phase unless another effect says otherwise.)

Title: Granddaughter of Dong Zhuo
Health/Gender: 3F
Ability:
Punish: Once during each hero's main phase, you may reveal a card from your hand and give it to another target hero. If the card is BLACK, the target hero chooses one: 1. Target hero discards 2 cards. 2. You draw 2 cards.
Crafty: Your black cards do not count towards you max hand size limit. BLACK cards you give to other heroes cannot be played or discarded unless their health decreases. (The hero must lose health or take damage before being able to use BLACK cards given or taken from you. Cards taken from you by any card effects or abilities are still under the effects of this ability.)

Title: Northern rrian King
Health/Gender: 4M
Ability:
Armed Upheaval: Your ATTACKs and BLACK non-delay tactics cards can target +X additional heroes. Whenever your ATTACK or BLACK non-delay tactics card targets any heroes, if the number of targets is less than X; X is reduced to 0. (X is the number of times you've dealt damage.)

Title: White Tiger of Dong Wu
Health/Gender: 4M
Ability:
Robbery: During your action phase, the first time you deal damage to another hero, you take a card from each equipment zone and judgement zone of that target hero. You cannot target any other heroes until the end of the turn. (You are only able to target yourself after activating this ability. This ability does not activate if you kill the hero you are targetin or when targeting a hero with no equipment or judgement cards in play for you to take.)
Lodge: Whenever another hero becomes the target of a RED basic or non-delay tactics card, if you are within 1 physical range of that hero and you are not the source of the card being played; you also become the target of the card.

Title: A Righteous Charge Through the Boundary Bridge
Health/Gender: 4M
Ability:
Concealed Horserider: Heroes within a range of 1 to you cannot play cards in response to the cards you play.
Arrogant and Unrestraint: If you are the hero with the highest number of cards in your hand, the damage you deal and the damage you receive is increased by +1.

Title: Father of Diao Chan
Health/Gender: 4M
Ability:
Continuios Calculations: Once during each hero's main phase, you may give an ATTACK or a BLACK tactics card to another target hero; the target hero equips a random weapon from the library and then chooses one: 1. The targeted hero uses the given card on another hero, then the targeted hero gives their equipped weapon to one of the heroes that were targeted by the used card. 2. Treat this as you using the given card on the targeted hero, then the targeted hero gives you the weapon. (Both you and the targeted hero must be able to completely fullfill either options, cards that cannot completely fullfill the options are illegal to use with this ability. Cards that are illegal to use are RRIAN ASSAULT, IMPECCABLE PLAN, and LIGHTNING BOLT. Cards that are potentially illegal due to some restrictions are ATTACK, DURESS, and RATIONS DEPLETED.)
Carry Out Scheme: (Awakening Ability) Whenever another hero has accumulatively dealt 3 or more damage by using cards received from [CONTINUIOUS CALCULATIONS], you lose the [CONTINUIOUS CALCULATIONS] ability and gain the [BOAST] ability.
[Boast]: Once during your main phase, you may play 1 equipment or ATTACK as a random tactics card. At the end of the turn, if you did not deal damage, you lose 1 health. Roll a 20-sided dice to see which tactics card is randomly chosen: 1. RRIAN ASSAULT 2. HAIL OF ARROWS 3. OATH OF PEACH GARDEN 4. HARVEST 5. SLEIGHT OF HAND 6. IMPECCABLE PLAN 7. BURN BRIDGES 8. DURESS 9. DUEL 10. PILFER 11. BLAZE 12. IRON CHAINS 13. ACEDIA 14. LIGHTNING BOLT 15. RATIONS DEPLETED 16. HIDDEN INTENTIONS 17. SEDUCTIVE RUSE 18+. Re-roll
(The color, rank and suit of the tactics card being played is the same as the equipment or ATTACK card used to activate this ability.)
Note: Wang Yun has 2 new tactics cards that can only be used under his possession, HIDDEN INTENTIONS and SEDUCTIVE RUSE. You may only be able to use these tactics cards through activating his [BOAST] ability.

Title: The Queen of Wa Friendly to Wei
Health/Gender: 3F
Ability:
Release Puppet: At the beginning of each round, a hero other than you with the lowest current health gains a [PUPPET] attached to their hero unless they already have a [PUPPET] attached. At the beginning of you turn, you may choose a target hero that does not have a [PUPPET] attached, then attach a [PUPPET] onto the targeted hero.
Bone Cut: Whenever a hero with a [PUPPET] is dealt damage, you draw a card.
False Worship: (Awakening Ability) At the beginning of your turn, if you have gained 7 or more cards from your [BONE CUT] ability, increase your max health by 1 and gain 1 health. The attach a [PUPPET] onto each hero who does not already have a [PUPPET] attached. You lose the [BONE CUT] ability and gain the [PUPPET MASTER] ability.
[Puppet Master]: Whenever you become the only target of a basic or non-delay tactics cards played by a hero with a [PUPPET] attached, you may remove the [PUPPET] from that hero and cancel the card effect. Whenever you play a basic or non-delay tactics card that only targets a hero, you may remove a [PUPPET] from another target hero and have that hero be an additional target.

Title: Arise from the Summer of Zhenjiang
Health/Gender: 3M
Ability:
Calculated Inquiry: At the beginning of your main phase, you may choose a target hero to reveal and give you a card. Until the end of turn, all other heroes may not respond to cards you play with the revealed card.
Station By the River: At the end of your turn, if you did not skip your main phase and did not play any cards during your main phase, you may draw X cards. (X is the number of surviving factions in play.)

Title: The Demon that Brings Droughts
Health/Gender: 4F
Ability:
Burning Sky: At the end if your turn, if the number of cards in your hand is less than your current health, you may choose a target hero within your attack range and take a card from their hand, then attach it onto your hero as a [BURNT] token. Your attack range is increased by X. (X is the number of [BURNT] tokens attached onto your hero.)
Broiling Day: (Awakaneing Ability) Whenever you have 3 or more [BURNT] tokens, you gain the [BURNING HEART] ability.
Burning Heart: Once during your main phase, you may discard 2 [BURNT] tokens and choose a target hero, the targeted hero loses 1 health.

Title: Held with a Tender Belevolence
Health/Gender: 3M
Ability:
Beckoning Misfortune: Whenever a hero enters the brink of death, your max health becomes 1. Whenever you lose 1 max health, you draw a card.
Moral Aid: Once per each hero's main phase, whenever you become the target of a card played by a hero, if the that hero's current health is greater than your current health, you may randomly take a basic card that you do not have in your hand from the deck.
Welcoming Offer: During your main phase, you may give all your non-basic cards from your hand to a target hero with max health greater than you max health; the amount of your max health becomes the same amount of max health of the targeted hero, then gain X health. (X is the types of cards you gave to the target hero.)

Title: Ambitions to Clear the Frost
Health/Gender: 4M
Ability:
Cleaving Axe: You may use this ability X times during your main phase. Choose a target hero to clash with, if you win, you choose one: 1. The targeted hero cannot play cards from their hand until the end of turn. 2. You may treat this as playing an ATTACK, this ATTACK does not count towards the ATTACK restriction limit.
If you lose the clash, you proceed to end your turn. (X is the number of surviving Loyalists in the game.)

Title: The People's General
Health/Gender: 4M
Ability:
Call to Arms: During your main phase, whenever you equip a weapon or play a card that targets yourself, you may perform a judgement. Then attach the judgement result to your hero as a [SQAURE]. (Non-delay tactics cards that are considered to target yourself would be SLEIGHT OF HAND, HARVEST, and OATH OF PEACH GARDEN. IRON CHAINS and DURESS could also be self targeting if the conditions are met.)
Unifying Power: At the end of your turn, you may discard a card and/or discard any number of [SQUARE] cards. If the sum of all the discarded cards is 36, you choose a target hero to deal 3 LIGHTNING damage to.
